Others: The Denver Nuggets lost their season opener to the OKC Thunder with a score of 87-87.
The Nuggets' three-point shooting was particularly poor, converting on just 7 of their 38 attempts (18.4%).
Nikola Jokic admitted that the team is not a good shooting team, with the exception of Michael Porter Jr. and Jamal Murray.
The Nuggets' bench had just one made three, which came from Russell Westbrook who went 1/6 from beyond the arc.
